examples.example: 在学习的过程中，遇到生词不要怕，我们可以通过各种方法去理解和掌握它。

translate.english: In the process of learning, don't be afraid when encountering new words. We can understand and master them through various methods.

examples.example: 我每天都会学习一些生词，这让我的词汇量不断增加。

translate.english: I learn some new words every day, which makes my vocabulary continuously increase.

examples.example: 老师总是鼓励我们多积累生词，这对提升语文素养很有帮助。

translate.english: Teachers always encourage us to accumulate more new words, which is very helpful for improving Chinese literacy.
